trans-unit.source: Associates a security action with a custom security attribute.
trans-unit.target: 将某安全操作与自定义安全特性相关联。

trans-unit.source: This class is intended for future use when the .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB is enabled for partial trust scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 在为部分信任方案启用 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序时，此类旨在供将来使用。

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework Data Provider for OLE DB currently requires FullTrust permission.
trans-unit.target: 用于 OLE DB.NET Framework 数据提供程序当前需要 FullTrust 权限。

trans-unit.source: Currently, using the `OleDbPermissionAttribute` class has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 目前，使用`OleDbPermissionAttribute`类没有任何效果。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Code Access Security and ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[代码访问安全性和 ADO.NET](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/code-access-security.md)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> values representing an action that can be performed by using declarative security.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.SecurityAction" /> 值，其表示可使用声明性安全执行的操作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermissionAttribute" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermissionAttribute" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission" /> object that is configured according to the attribute properties.
trans-unit.target: 返回一个根据特性属性配置的 <see cref="T:System.Data.OleDb.OleDbPermission" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a comma-delimited string that contains a list of supported providers.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置包含受支持的提供程序的列表的逗号分隔字符串。

trans-unit.source: A comma-delimited list of providers allowed by the security policy.
trans-unit.target: 该安全策略所允许的提供程序的逗号分隔列表。
